name: Darius: Mini Mail Madness
description:
It's time for Darius' mail delivery! This time, has the help of the minis. Can you deliver mail to all of the correct mailboxes without losing any of them?

Space to jump

A and D to move

W and S to move between layers on a crosswalk

Click to connect girders

Right Click to disconnect girders

Once you correctly deliver all the mailboxes, head back to the truck to finish the level!

Game by:

Dignity, PlugNPlay (Programmers)

NanTheDark, Charlottea (Artists)

FastMario (Music, Sound Design)

Linktober (Level Design)
